slides.content: This site showcases a few games I made between 2007 and 2012 using Game Maker. You can download them freely (run on Windows only).

slides.desc: You have to guide small balls throughout the levels using mouse-drawn polygons.
The 8 levels make use of gravity, speed, fire/water/ice interaction.

slides.content: Shmup game based on the self-titled movie.

slides.desc: You control the minivan of Olive's family and got to avoid other vehicles on the road.
The landscape elements appear in sync with the music.
Includes a hardcore mode where you have to hit as many cows on the road as possible.
3 kind of baits allow you to catch 4 kinds of fish.
A piece from Modest Mouse is used as a soundtrack. The waves and the boat move in sync with it.
In the first part of the game you prepare the rocket before launch, adding bonuses like speed, resistance, etc.
Once in space the goal is to clean the waste left by broken satellites using a giant vacuum cleaner.
Bowies music inspired the story and is used as a soundtrack. Lyrics appear at the bottom like a Karaoke.
It tells the story of a youg farmer who participates in the communist revolution led by Mao in the early 20st century.
The game alternates between challenges & missions taking you throughout China.
A Chinese Story is only available as a demo for now.
It is an adaptation of the story from Homer, but in a futuristic world.
You need to protect a city from incoming tanks/rockets using a colored light projector.
After finishing the 4 main levels, 2 hardcore modes are available : no bonuses or sudden-death.
